uniol.apt.analysis.synthesize.separation

Class SeparationUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniol.apt.analysis.synthesize.separation.SeparationUtility

  • public final class SeparationUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper functions for solving separation problems.
    Author:
    Uli Schlachter

    • Method Detail

      • isEventEnabled

        public static boolean isEventEnabled(State state,
                                     java.lang.String event)
        Test if there exists an outgoing arc labelled with the given event.
        Parameters:
        state - The state to examine.
        event - The event that should fire.
        Returns:
        True if a suitable arc exists, else false.

      • isSeparatingRegion

        public static boolean isSeparatingRegion(Region region,
                                         State state,
                                         State otherState)
        Check if the given region separates the two given states.
        Parameters:
        region - The region to examine.
        state - The first state of the separation problem
        otherState - The second state of the separation problem
        Returns:
        A separating region or null.

      • isSeparatingRegion

        public static boolean isSeparatingRegion(Region region,
                                         State state,
                                         java.lang.String event)
        Check if the given region separates the state from the event.
        Parameters:
        region - The region to examine.
        state - The state of the separation problem
        event - The event of the separation problem
        Returns:
        A separating region or null.

      • getLocationMap

        public static java.lang.String[] getLocationMap(RegionUtility utility,
                                                PNProperties properties)
                                         throws MissingLocationException
        Calculate a mapping from events to their location. Note that this also handles output-nonbranching and will unset output-nonbranching in properties, if it is specified.
        Parameters:
        utility - The region utility that describes the events.
        properties - Properties that may influence the location map.
        Returns:
        An array containing the location for each event.
        Throws:
        MissingLocationException - if the transition system for the utility has locations for only some events

      • createSeparationInstance

        public static Separation createSeparationInstance(RegionUtility utility,
                                                  PNProperties properties)
                                           throws MissingLocationException
        Construct a new Separation instance.
        Parameters:
        utility - The region utility to use.
        properties - Properties that the calculated region should satisfy.
        Returns:
        A suitable Separation instance
        Throws:
        MissingLocationException - if the transition system for the utility has locations for only some events

      • createSynthesizerInstance

        public static Synthesizer createSynthesizerInstance(RegionUtility utility,
                                                    PNProperties properties,
                                                    boolean onlyEventSeparation,
                                                    boolean quickFail)
                                             throws MissingLocationException
        Construct a new Synthesizer instance.
        Parameters:
        utility - The region utility to use.
        properties - Properties that the calculated region should satisfy.
        onlyEventSeparation - A flag indicating that state separation should be ignored.
        quickFail - If true, stop the calculation as soon as it is known that it won't be successful. If false, try to solve all separation problems. Only if true will the list of failed problems be fully filled.
        Returns:
        A suitable Separation instance
        Throws:
        MissingLocationException - if the transition system for the utility has locations for only some events
